messageBlockPermissionRequest.title: Permission Required
messageBlockPermissionRequest.allowOnceTooltip: Execute this command once without saving the decision.
messageBlockPermissionRequest.allowForSessionTooltip: Remember this command for this conversation only.

description.read: Allow '{toolName}' from '{serverName}' to perform read operations?
description.write: Allow '{toolName}' from '{serverName}' to perform write operations?
description.all: Allow '{toolName}' from '{serverName}' to perform read and write operations?

suggestion.low: This is a read-only command with minimal impact.
suggestion.medium: This command may change state or install dependencies. Review before running.
suggestion.high: This command modifies files or system state. Proceed carefully.
suggestion.critical: This command can be destructive or access external networks. Verify intent.

promptParamsDialog.title: {name} Parameter Settings
promptParamsDialog.description: Please fill in the parameters below. Fields marked * are required.
